attributes.action: Change the law as regards rabbit welfare.
attributes.additional_details: To improve the lives of rabbits and stop rabbits from being Britain’s number 1 most neglected pet.
attributes.background: Ban hutches and small enclosures, stop selling unsafe rabbit treats and toys , make vaccinating rabbits compulsory

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

rejection.details: You may wish to start a new petition which makes clear which rabbit enclosures, treats and toys you think should be banned.
